metadata.title: CVE-2022-21363 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/J). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.27 and prior.Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Connectors.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of MySQLConnectors. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 6.6 (Confidentiality, Integrity andAvailability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
